data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Al Farwaniyah, Kuwait.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Farwaniyah, Kuwait

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Al Farwaniyah to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Al Farwaniyah, Kuwait.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Al Farwaniyah, Kuwait a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Al Farwaniyah words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Al Farwaniyah, Kuwait be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Farwaniyah, Kuwait has a population of 640,400.

We estimate Al Farwaniyah has 9,638 people who might know Jesus, 54,855 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 575,907 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 66 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 9,638 believers in the state of Al Farwaniyah the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
